  • CV

    Hi there! I am Jie, this is my website. I am currently pursuing a PhD with advisors of Associate Professor Jianhua Guo and Professor Gene Tyson. This PhD focuses on microbial ecology with financial support of UQ Research Training Program Scholarship. Pursuing a PhD is exiting and the journey will be finished around the middle of 2022.

    With passion on microbial ecology, I have been involved in some publications. Such passion extends to coding as well, in the form of pipeline development using Python.

    I have worked in a wide range of different environments from molecular biology science to bioinformatics. The wet lab experience of molecular biology aids in data analysis a lots. For me, it’s exciting to work with different people and to learn from different professionals, these experiences largely diversified my skillset and enabled me a solid foundation as an independent researcher.

    What's more, those passion extend to sport! I am currently a fan of jogging and have participated in the Toohey Trail Run 2019 and Brisbane Marathon Festival 2021.

    Finally, I'd happy to brainstorm and you are warmly welcome to contact!
